mapper.select: SELECT QNA_FILE_IDX, ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, STORED_FILE_NAME, ROUND(FILE_SIZE/1024, 1) FILE_SIZE, PATH FROM QNA_FILE WHERE BOARD_IDX = #{value}
SELECT ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, STORED_FILE_NAME, EXTENSION FROM QNA_FILE WHERE QNA_FILE_IDX = #{value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA_FILE (BOARD_IDX, USER_IDX, ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, STORED_FILE_NAME, EXTENSION, FILE_SIZE, PATH) VALUES (#{board_idx}, #{user_idx}, #{original_file_name}, #{stored_file_name}, #{extension}, #{file_size}, #{path})
